title: Space. Light. Comfort. Home.
posting_body: Sunny, spacious, extra-wide, 3 Bed/2 Bath 1,800+ sq ft 3rd-floor unit available in owner-occupied 3-unit historic building.
Newly renovated with charming original details throughout.
Gorgeous hardwood floors and original molding; beautiful vintage tile; decorative fireplace, central heat & air with smart thermostat.
Separate living room, dining room, breakfast nook with built-in cabinets and walk-in pantry.
Free laundry in building with dedicated tenant storage on ground level.
Shared paved patio with gas grill.
1 block to Warren Park, 10 min walk to Indian Boundary Park.
3/4 mile to Rogers Park Metra station.
West Ridge (West Rogers Park) is an urban melting pot with an urban suburban feel.
One of Chicago's most diverse neighborhoods, there is a wide array of global cuisine, a vibrant mix of nationalities, and a strong sense of community.
Can be available as early as August 1 or anytime leading up to September 1; $2,125/month includes water, garbage and recycling, 1 garage spot.
Email/text with any questions or to schedule showing.
